name: Allstate
description: The Allstate Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, provides property and casualty, and other insurance products in the United States and Canada. It operates in five segments: Allstate Protection; Run-off Property-Liability; Protection Services; Allstate Health and Benefits; and Corporate and Other. The company offers private passenger auto, homeowners, personal lines, and commercial insurance products through agents, contact centers, and online; and property and casualty insurance products. It also provides consumer product protection plans, device and mobile data collection services, and analytic solutions using automotive telematics information, roadside assistance, and protection plans; and insurance products, such as identity pro
